name: ricardos-claude-code
description: Ricardo's personal Claude Code setup for Python AI engineering - 6 commands, 10 specialized agents, 8 pattern skills, and 7 MCP servers
author: Ricardo Roche

commands.name: primer
commands.description: Prime Claude with project context using Serena semantic code retrieval

commands.name: fix
commands.description: Auto-fix Python issues with ruff, black, and mypy

commands.name: api
commands.description: Create FastAPI endpoint with validation and error handling

commands.name: lint
commands.description: Run Python linting and type checking

agents.name: code-reviewer
agents.description: Comprehensive Python code review with security analysis, performance optimization, and best practices

agents.name: write-unit-tests
agents.description: Generate pytest-based unit tests with good coverage

agents.name: debug-test-failure
agents.description: Debug and fix failing Python tests

agents.name: implement-feature
agents.description: Implement Python features with FastAPI and Strands patterns

agents.name: add-agent-tool
agents.description: Add tools to AI agents following best design patterns

agents.name: upgrade-dependency
agents.description: Manage Python dependency upgrades and migrations

agents.name: optimize-db-query
agents.description: Optimize SQL and DuckDB queries for performance

skills.name: tool-design-pattern
skills.description: AI tool design guidelines and patterns

skills.name: pytest-patterns
skills.description: Pytest testing patterns and best practices

memory.description: Persistent memory across Claude Code sessions - stores architecture decisions, API endpoints, common patterns, and project context

serena.description: Semantic code retrieval - understands code structure at symbol level (functions, classes, variables), multi-language support, efficient code search

context7.description: Access up-to-date documentation for any library - Python packages, FastAPI, Pydantic, pytest, and more

duckdb-operational.description: Query operational database - application data, user records, transactions, operational metrics

duckdb-analytics.description: Query analytics database - performance metrics, usage statistics, business intelligence data

linear.description: Linear issue tracking - create issues, update status, link to commits (requires: /mcp to authenticate)

notion.description: Notion workspace - search pages, create pages, update documentation (requires: OAuth authentication on first use)
